label: first-order administrative division
desc: a primary administrative division of a country, such as a state in the United States

label: second-order administrative division
desc: a subdivision of a first-order administrative division

label: third-order administrative division
desc: a subdivision of a second-order administrative division

label: fourth-order administrative division
desc: a subdivision of a third-order administrative division

label: fifth-order administrative division
desc: a subdivision of a fourth-order administrative division

label: administrative division
desc: an administrative division of a country, undifferentiated as to administrative level

label: historical administrative division
desc: a former administrative division of a political entity, undifferentiated as to administrative level

label: leased area
desc: a tract of land leased to another country, usually for military installations

label: buffer zone
desc: a zone recognized as a buffer between two nations in which military presence is minimal or absent
